articles.author: Paul McLeary
articles.title: Hegseth declares end of US 'utopian idealism' with new military strategy - Politico
articles.description: The Defense secretary, speaking at the Reagan Defense Forum, outlined defense priorities that focus on the Western Hemisphere and reevaluate the U.S. relationship with Europe.
articles.content:
Out with idealistic utopianism, he said. In with hard-nosed realism.
The Defense secretarys speech revealed an administration moving toward a policy that recognizes zones of influence led by great p… [+3872 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Chiglinsky
articles.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Says Europe Has a ‘Real Problem’ - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon called out slow bureaucracy in Europe in a warning that a “weak” continent poses a major economic risk to the US.
articles.content:
